text: The 1951 World Table Tennis Championships – Women's Singles was the 18th edition of the women's singles championship. Angelica Rozeanu defeated Gizi Farkas in the final by three sets to nil, to win the title. ==Results== \+ Time limit rule applied ==See also== List of World Table Tennis Championships medalists ==References== \- Category:1951 in women's table tennis
title: 1951 World Table Tennis Championships – Women's Singles
